Source code for havoc.autoval.lib.host.system.bios.models.yosemite_v2_bios

from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals
from havoc.autoval.lib.host.system.bios.system_bios import SystemBios
from havoc.autotest_testfiles.validation_utils.lib.autoval_exceptions import TestError

import os
import time


[docs]class YosemiteV2Bios(SystemBios):

[docs]    def __init__(self, host):
        self.host = host
        self.toolpath = None
        super(YosemiteV2Bios, self).__init__(host)



[docs]    def boot_sequence_additional_settings(self, cmos_reset=True):
        if cmos_reset:
            options = "enable"
        else:
            options = "disable"
        return {"Boot Priority Override": {"token": "97", "Options": options}}



[docs]    def get_boot_option_seq_token_number(self):
        return "A3"


    def _get_bios_update_cmd(self, binary_path, binary_name, toolpath, toolname):
        self.toolpath = toolpath
        dut_dir = self.get_dut_dir(toolpath)
        self.copy_binaries_dut(toolpath, dut_dir)
        server_model = self.host.oob.get_manufacturer()
        if "Quanta" in server_model:
            return "./%s %s" % (toolname, binary_name)
        else:
            return (
                "echo 0 > /proc/sys/kernel/nmi_watchdog; ./afulnx_64 %s /p /b /n /k /me /x ; echo 1 > /proc/sys/kernel/nmi_watchdog"
                % (os.path.join(self.toolpath, binary_name))
            )


[docs]    def cycle_post_bios_upgrade(self):
        self.host.oob.power_off()
        time.sleep(30)
        self.host.oob.cmos_clear()
        time.sleep(30)
        self.host.oob.ac_cycle()


    def _get_pcie_error_cmds(self, port_id, error_type):
        error_inject_cmd = "echo 0x04 > flags"

        cmd_list = [
            "echo %s > param4" % self.generate_pcie_port_address(port_id),
            error_inject_cmd,
            "echo %s  > error_type" % error_type,
            "echo 1 > error_inject",
        ]
        return cmd_list

    def _get_memory_error_cmds(self, mem_addr, error_type, make=None):
        error_inject_cmd = {
            "wiwynn": "echo $((-1 << 12))  > param2",
            "quanta": "echo 0xfffffffffffff000 > param2",
        }
        if not make:
            make = self.host.oob.get_manufacturer().lower()
        if make not in error_inject_cmd:
            raise TestError("Error injection not-supported for '%s'" % make)

        cmd_list = [
            "echo %s > param1" % mem_addr,
            error_inject_cmd[make],
            "echo %s  > error_type" % error_type,
            "echo 1 > error_inject",
        ]
        return cmd_list


[docs]    def get_memory_correctable_error_cmds(self, mem_addr, make=None):
        cmd_list = self._get_memory_error_cmds(mem_addr, "0x00000008", make)
        return cmd_list



[docs]    def get_pcie_correctable_error_cmds(self, pcie_port):
        cmd_list = self._get_pcie_error_cmds(pcie_port, "0x00000040")
        return cmd_list



[docs]    def get_memory_uncorrectable_fatal_error_cmds(self, mem_addr, make=None):
        cmd_list = self._get_memory_error_cmds(mem_addr, "0x00000020", make)
        return cmd_list



[docs]    def get_pcie_uncorrectable_error_fatal_cmds(self, pcie_port):
        cmd_list = self._get_pcie_error_cmds(pcie_port, "0x00000080")
        return cmd_list



[docs]    def get_memory_uncorrectable_nonfatal_error_cmds(self, mem_addr, make=None):
        cmd_list = self._get_memory_error_cmds(mem_addr, "0x00000010", make)
        return cmd_list



[docs]    def get_pcie_uncorrectable_error_nonfatal_cmds(self, pcie_port):
        cmd_list = self._get_pcie_error_cmds(pcie_port, "0x00000100")
        return cmd_list
